key.name: skip-warning-dialog
key.description: Whether the warning dialog in development versions of Evolution is skipped.

key.name: attachment-view
key.description: Initial view for attachment bar widgets. “0” is Icon View, “1” is List View.

key.name: file-chooser-folder
key.description: Initial folder for GtkFileChooser dialogs.

key.name: autoar-format
key.description: Compression format used when compressing attached directories with autoar.

key.name: autoar-filter
key.description: Compression filter used when compressing attached directories with autoar.

key.name: start-offline
key.description: Whether Evolution will start up in offline mode instead of online mode.

key.name: folder-paths
key.description: List of paths for the folders to be synchronized to disk for offline usage.

key.name: express-mode
key.description: Flag that enables a much simplified user interface.

key.name: buttons-hide
key.summary: List of button names to hide in the window switcher
key.description: Valid values are “mail”, “addressbook”, “calendar”, “tasks” and “memos”. Change of this requires restart of the application.

key.name: buttons-visible
key.description: Whether the window buttons should be visible.

key.name: buttons-visible-sub
key.description: Whether the window buttons should be visible.

key.name: buttons-style
key.description: The style of the window buttons. Can be “text”, “icons”, “both”, “toolbar”. If “toolbar” is set, the style of the buttons is determined by the GNOME toolbar setting.

key.name: menubar-visible
key.description: Whether the menubar should be visible.

key.name: menubar-visible-sub
key.description: Whether the menubar should be visible.

key.name: toolbar-visible
key.description: Whether the toolbar should be visible.

key.name: toolbar-visible-sub
key.description: Whether the toolbar should be visible.

key.name: sidebar-visible
key.description: Whether the sidebar should be visible.

key.name: sidebar-visible-sub
key.description: Whether the sidebar should be visible.

key.name: statusbar-visible
key.description: Whether the status bar should be visible.

key.name: statusbar-visible-sub
key.description: Whether the status bar should be visible.

key.name: default-component-id
key.summary: ID or alias of the component to be shown by default at start-up.
key.description: ID or alias of the component to be shown by default at start-up.

key.name: folder-bar-width
key.description: The default width for the sidebar, in pixels.

key.name: folder-bar-width-sub
key.description: The default width for the sidebar, in pixels.

key.name: webkit-developer-mode
key.description: Any change of this option requires restart of Evolution.

key.name: backup-restore-extension
key.summary: The last extension being used when backing up Evolution data.
key.description: It can be either “.gz” or “.xz” and it influences what extension will be preselected in the file chooser.

key.name: search-web-uri-prefix
key.summary: Prefix of the URI to use to search the web with selected text.
key.description: The prefix of a URL to be used for searches on the web. The actual text selection is escaped and appended to this string. The URI should start with https://.

key.name: webkit-minimum-font-size
key.summary: Minimum font size to be used by WebKitGTK
key.description: The minimum font size in pixels used to display text in WebKitGTK. This setting controls the absolute smallest size. Values other than 0 can potentially break page layouts. Negative values are treated as 0.

key.name: filename-illegal-chars
key.summary: Set of additional illegal characters in the filename
key.description: When generating file names from custom strings some non-printable or reserved characters are replaced with an underscore. Here's a set of additional characters to be replaced.
